User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:8.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0.1
Build ID: 20111120135848

Steps to reproduce:

Started Thunderbird and Lightning's alarm window popped up. Then appointments are added to the alarm window. All appointments are sorted.


Actual results:

It can happen that appointments are added and displayed in sorted order and after a while additional appointments are added (delayed). Normally, the first item in the alarm window is selected and opened.

But if the first item is selected and other appointments are added to the alarm window with a delay and these items are sorted before the first item (which is the selected item), the selected is not changed.


Expected results:

When Thunderbird is opened and the alarm window is displayed, I would expect that the first item of the list is selected.

At least the selection should change (to the first element), unless the user has clicked on a different item and selected it by himself.
